meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to operate or function as a machine.
meanings.sent1: Her machineabilities were evident as she effortlessly fixed the broken robot.
meanings.sent2: The robot's machineabilities allowed it to perform complex tasks with precision.
meanings.sent3: The machineabilities of the toaster made it the star of the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: His machineabilities in repairing engines were like magic to those who watched.
meanings.sent5: The machineabilities of the vacuum cleaner made cleaning a breeze.

meanings.definition: The skills or capabilities possessed by a machine.
meanings.sent1: The robot's advanced machineabilities impressed the engineers.
meanings.sent2: Machines with high machineabilities can outperform humans in certain tasks.
meanings.sent3: The machineabilities of the coffee maker saved the day during the power outage.
meanings.sent4: Her machineabilities in coding were unmatched in the tech industry.
meanings.sent5: The machineabilities of the 3D printer revolutionized manufacturing processes.
